types.html:
mobilité douce f (countable and uncountable, plural mobilités douces)

  1. (uncountable) active mobility, soft mobility, active transportation
  2. (countable) sustainable means of transport, especially one that does not involve the use of a motor but is only powered by human physical activity
trans: active mobility, soft mobility, active transportation
sustainable means of transport, especially one that does not involve the use of a motor but is only powered by human physical activity
